{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Starfell Valley|It|Starfell Valley}} is considered the most diverse region of Mondstadt, spreading far from the tip of [[Stormbearer Point]] to the ends of the [[Whispering Woods]]. It is also home to the [[City of Mondstadt]] in [[Cider Lake]]. The area also consists of abundant lakes and tree variety.</p><p>The area is where the [[Knights of Favonius]]'s duties primarily takes place, protecting locals and travelers alike with guards patrolling around the area.</p>}}
